evidence.title: Why Zscaler Shares Are Tumbling Despite Earnings Beat
evidence.summary: Investor sentiment may be influenced by factors not reflected in the earnings report, leading to a sharp decline in share price.

key_points: Zscaler shares fell sharply despite beating EPS and revenue estimates.
Market reaction suggests investor concerns beyond financial performance.
raw.why_it_moves: Investor sentiment may be influenced by factors not reflected in the earnings report, leading to a sharp decline in share price.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler 주식이 실적 초과에도 불구하고 급락하는 이유

evidence.title: Zscaler (ZS) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
evidence.summary: Strong earnings beat expectations, signaling positive momentum for the stock.

key_points: Q2 earnings and revenue exceeded estimates by +12.94% and +2.22%
Positive performance may indicate strong market position and future growth potential
raw.why_it_moves: Strong earnings beat expectations, signaling positive momentum for the stock.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler (ZS) Q2 수익과 매출 예상치를 상회

evidence.title: Zscaler (ZS) Q2 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
evidence.summary: Earnings call details provide insight into company performance but no significant positive or negative news was reported.

key_points: Q2 2026 earnings call held with Jay Chaudhry and Kevin Rubin participating.
Zscaler's Zero Trust architecture highlighted as key to minimizing attack surface.
raw.why_it_moves: Earnings call details provide insight into company performance but no significant positive or negative news was reported.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler (ZS) 2026年第2季度收益电话会议纪要

evidence.title: Zscaler Inc (ZS) Q2 2026 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong ARR Growth and AI Security Expansion ...
evidence.summary: Robust earnings and growth in AI security solutions positively impact Zscaler's stock.

raw.why_it_moves: Robust earnings and growth in AI security solutions positively impact Zscaler's stock.
raw.kr_title: Z스케일러 인코포레이티드 (ZS) Q2 2026 이익电话会议亮点：强劲的ARR增长和AI安全扩展

evidence.title: Zscaler Airtel AI Cyber Center Opens As Shares Trade Below Targets

key_points: Zscaler launches AI & Cyber Threat Research Center in India with Bharti Airtel.
Focus on cybersecurity research and expanding local talent.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler, 아리텔 인공지능 및 사이버 보안 연구 센터 오픈

evidence.title: Zscaler Falls Sharply After Solid Earnings. Software Stocks Are Wild Right Now.
evidence.summary: Earnings beat expectations, but the stock fell sharply initially, indicating mixed market reaction.

key_points: Zscaler reported solid earnings with adjusted earnings of $1.01 per share beating estimates.
Full-year guidance was also ahead of consensus at between $3.99 and $4.02 per share.
raw.why_it_moves: Earnings beat expectations, but the stock fell sharply initially, indicating mixed market reaction.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler의 실적 발표 후 주가 급락... 소프트웨어 투자자들에게는 어떤가?

evidence.title: Zscaler Q2 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
evidence.summary: Strong financial performance and positive guidance boost investor confidence.

key_points: Q2 earnings surpass estimates with 26% revenue growth
Strong customer momentum and lifted full-year outlook
raw.why_it_moves: Strong financial performance and positive guidance boost investor confidence.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler, Q2 실적 예상 초과, 매출 26% 증가

evidence.title: Zscaler Stock Falls On Q4 Earnings, Outlook For Key Sales Growth Metric
evidence.summary: Earnings exceeded expectations, but concerns over future growth metrics led to stock decline.

key_points: Analysts focused on a key growth metric.
raw.why_it_moves: Earnings exceeded expectations, but concerns over future growth metrics led to stock decline.
raw.kr_title: Zscaler 주식, 제기준 성장 지표에 따른 4분기 이익 발표 후 하락

decisions.rationale: Zscaler's recent earnings report showed strong financial performance and positive guidance, despite a sharp decline in share price due to mixed market reaction.
key_drivers: Earnings beat expectations with +12.94% EPS surprise and +2.22% revenue growth
Robust demand for AI security solutions
key_risks: Concerns over future sales growth metrics
Mixed market reaction to positive earnings report
decisions.valuation_view: Current price may reflect short-term pessimism, offering a potential buying opportunity.
counterfactuals: If Zscaler's guidance is downgraded or if there are significant competitive pressures in the AI security space.
next_checks: Monitor Q2 earnings call transcript for additional insights
Watch for any updates on key sales growth metrics

decisions.rationale: 현재 Zscaler의 주가는 양호한 실적과 함께 긍정적인 흐름을 보이고 있으나, 시장 전체가 위험회피 모드로 전환되면서 추가 상승 여력이 제한적입니다.
key_drivers: Q2 실적 발표에서 매출 및 이익 모두 예상치를 상회하며 긍정적인 신호를 보냈습니다.
key_risks: 시장 전체가 위험회피 모드로 전환되면서 추가 상승이 어려울 수 있습니다.

counterfactuals: 향후 실적이 예상치를 밑돌거나 시장 전반의 위험회피 모드가 지속될 경우 주가는 하락할 수 있습니다.

decisions.rationale: Zscaler delivered strong Q2 earnings and revenue beats, but the stock fell sharply initially due to concerns over future growth metrics.
key_drivers: Robust demand for Zscaler's platform and AI solutions
Strong ARR growth and expansion in AI security
key_risks: Concerns over future sales growth metrics
Mixed market reaction despite positive earnings
decisions.valuation_view: Current price reflects mixed sentiment; fair value uncertain without clearer guidance on future growth.
counterfactuals: If Zscaler provides more clarity on future growth prospects, the stock could rebound.
next_checks: Monitor Q3 earnings for further insights into revenue and growth trends
Watch for any updates or developments in AI security expansion
